disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 6 April to end of Thursday 7 April GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Some sun and further rain expected during Wednesday and Thursday, but with lighter winds on Thursday.<br/><br/>Clean air arriving from the Atlantic, strong winds will aid dispersion of local emissions.  <br/><br/>Overall air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
